evidence.title: README (segment 1)
evidence.excerpt: A UI library with Open Architecture for Vue.js 3 and Nuxt.js 3 / 4, powered by [Storybook v10](https://storybook.js.org) and [Tailwind CSS v4](https://tailwindcss.com).

evidence.title: README (segment 2)
evidence.excerpt: **With Vueless UI, you‚Äôre free to:** - ü™ÑÔ∏è Customize any component - üìã Copy and extend existing ones - üß± Build your own from scratch - üìï Document it all seamlessly in Storybook

evidence.title: README (segment 4)
evidence.excerpt: - üß© 65+ crafted UI components (including range date picker, multi-select, and nested table) - ‚ú® Open Architecture lets you customize, copy, extend, and create your own components - üìï Built-in Storybook support - ü™© Theme Builder for runtime theme customization - üåà Beautiful default UI theme - üåÄ Unstyled mode - üåó Light and dark mode - üß¨ Design tokens powered by CSS variables - ‚öôÔ∏è Server-side rendering (SSR) - üåç Internationalization (i18n) - ‚ôøÔ∏è Accessibility (a11y) - üñºÔ∏è Inline SVG icons - ü™Ñ Auto component imports (as you use them) - üßø Uncompiled source in npm for better DX - üß™Ô∏è 1400+ unit tests ensuring consistent logic - üõ°Ô∏è Full TypeScript support with type safety

evidence.title: README (segment 5)
evidence.excerpt: No setup, no hacks ‚Äî just a fully functional Storybook preset ready to test your Vueless UI design system out of the box.

evidence.title: README (segment 7)
evidence.excerpt: Customize colors, rounding, and typography at runtime, generate full palettes, and export a ready-to-use theme to your project.

evidence.title: README (segment 8)
evidence.excerpt: To get started with Vueless UI, simply paste the following code into your terminal:

evidence.title: v1.4.1
evidence.excerpt: ## [1.4.1](https://github.com/vuelessjs/vueless/compare/v1.4.0...v1.4.1) (2026-02-24) ### üêõ Bug Fixes * ULink: switch to `inject` for `router` and `route` to prevent dependency errors in non-router contexts ([d721a56](https://github.com/vuelessjs/vueless/commit/d721a56035cf2d704574176714abb72467e9c02e))

evidence.title: v1.4.0
evidence.excerpt: ## [1.4.0](https://github.com/vuelessjs/vueless/compare/v1.3.8...v1.4.0) (2026-02-23) ### ‚ú® Features * UInputNumber and UInputCounter: add debounce functionality ([6edde87](https://github.com/vuelessjs/vueless/commit/6edde8768388332b7bb11e2133b6eae78cf652d9)) * Add design system colors for `outline` tailwind stylesheet ([94171f2](https://github.com/vuelessjs/vueless/commit/94171f254b822a1cfb49ff4abf14334008bbf525)) * Add `useVirtualScroll` composable for efficient rendering of large lists ([294642a](https://github.com/vuelessjs/vueless/commit/294642a60252a58cc6233822d8d31cbdc829d0cf)) * UModalConfirm: add loading props to enable loader on confirm button ([fdd1936](https://github.com/vuelessjs/vueless/commit/fdd1936cdb29f6c0f135d1a567b2564d803daf8b)) * UNumber: add `raw` mode to render unformatted plain text (useful to use it in table cell with big number of rows) ([0b774d7](https://github.com/vuelessjs/vueless/commit/0b774d718e4af64717de5af5522118fedde8c3cb)) * UTable: add search / virtual search and highlight functionality ([33a1b94](https://github.com/vuelessjs/vueless/commit/33a1b94e237117530ce1cf2611932608ab82b74a)) * UTable: add text ellipsis support for table cells ([e268521‚Ä¶

evidence.title: v1.3.8
evidence.excerpt: ## [1.3.8](https://github.com/vuelessjs/vueless/compare/v1.3.7...v1.3.8) (2026-01-24) ### ‚ú® Features * UCard: add `divided` prop to toggle divider between content and footer ([034ef96](https://github.com/vuelessjs/vueless/commit/034ef96f8df8157e648b2043bb237507c53fa48b)) * UPagination: emit `change` event when pagination value updates ([9c82a52](https://github.com/vuelessjs/vueless/commit/9c82a5260e8d7b742b50682737325c98f7a50366)) ### üêõ Bug Fixes * UDrawer: change default position to `right` ([14dc960](https://github.com/vuelessjs/vueless/commit/14dc9605522d25013241a53e20ebafbeab708f7b)) * UDrawer: prevent closing drawer if mouse down on overlay and move mouse ([3ae616a](https://github.com/vuelessjs/vueless/commit/3ae616aa283605cf27a13732be127e51225efb1b)) * UDrawer: set `modelValue` default to `true` for storybook examples ([300b835](https://github.com/vuelessjs/vueless/commit/300b835bfd6b1c3c747547083b7c2b31d9680bfd)) * UDrawer: update handle and position dimensions ([0d5fc78](https://github.com/vuelessjs/vueless/commit/0d5fc7859382a1a8bae5fd5b1ee6ef3929c83ef3)) * UEmpty: update styles and enhance slot content handling ([6838266](https://github.com/vuelessjs/vueless/commit/6838‚Ä¶
